sub_topic: The construction of the Heighway dragon curve.
message_1: What is the length of the Heighway Dragon Curve after the 7th iteration, if the starting segment has a length of 1 unit?
message_2:
The length of the Heighway Dragon Curve after the nth iteration can be calculated using the formula:

Length = (Initial segment length) * (2^n)

In this case, the initial segment length is 1 unit, and we want to find the length after the 7th iteration. So, n = 7.

Length = 1 * (2^7) = 1 * 128 = 128 units

The length of the Heighway Dragon Curve after the 7th iteration is 128 units.
